thread.title: VW owners could fail MOTs if they ignore recall
thread.title_full: VW owners could fail MOTs if they ignore recall

author: Steven Swinford
title: VW owners could fail MOTs if they ignore recall
text: Road and rail transport VW owners could fail MOTs if they ignore recall Patrick McLoughlin, the Transport select committee, is considering plans to change MOT tests if people fail to respond to Volkswagen's recall in wake of diesel emissions scandal Volkswagen has announced the recall of 1.2million cars By Steven Swinford , Deputy Political Editor 10:00PM BST 23 Oct 2015
